title: Bio
content: Adaptable and detail-oriented Computer Engineer with hands-on experience in Machine Learning, backend development, and API integration. Known for innovation and problem-solving.

title: Education
content:
• B.S. in Computer Engineering, National University Bulacan (2020–2024)
• Accountancy, Business, and Management, Colegio de Calumpit Inc. (2018–2020)

title: Technical Skills
content:
• Web & Mobile Development: ReactJS, React Native, Express.js, FastAPI
• Languages: Python, JavaScript, C++
• Tools: Git, WebSocket, MQTT, Google Cloud, Docker
• Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase
• AI/ML: DeepFace, OpenCV, YOLO, TensorFlow/Keras

title: Face Recognition Attendance System
content: Developed a freelance attendance tracking system using Python DeepFace for facial recognition, RFID authentication hardware, and a ReactJS frontend + Express.js/MySQL backend.

title: Trash Segregation ML
content: Built an AI-powered trash segregation prototype. Trained and fine-tuned classification models achieving >90% sorting accuracy.

title: POS & Inventory System
content: Academic project: ReactJS frontend with Express.js/MySQL backend, JWT-based auth, sales and inventory management dashboard.

title: IoT Pet Feeder (Capstone)
content: Automated pet feeder controlled via React Native app, with scheduling logic, camera monitoring, and weight-sensor integration on microcontroller.

title: Cemetery Mapping Web App
content: Freelance ReactJS + Express.js project integrating Google Maps API and MySQL to manage and visualize grave locations.

title: E-Trucking Real-Time GPS Tracking
content: Logistics tracking system: ReactJS/React Native frontends, Express.js/MySQL backend, real-time location updates with role-based access.

title: Real-Time Location Sharing App
content: Personal project like Life360 using React Native, MQTT, and Express.js. Implements group-based secure location sharing and offline sync.
